description: The New Vegas Armory Big Fuckin' Revolver. Chambered in .45-70 govt. rounds, this chunky behemoth of a revolver will ensure it's wielder won't be the 21st to take a slip.

The New Vegas Armory Big Fuckin' Revolver. Chambered in .45-70 govt. rounds, this chunky behemoth of a revolver can take out just about anything in the wasteland. This variant is the black Ranger Sequoia, given to veteran NCR rangers after 20 years of service. A beloved prize gun of its wielders, the barrel is engraved with the phrases 'Against all tyrants' and 'For Honorable Service.', while the grip has an engraving of a bear, and a brass plate on the bottom, engraved with the phrase '20 years of service'.
